summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 17065 entitled: "An ordinance authorizing and directing the drawing of warrants upon condemnation funds in favor of the general fund as a reimbursement of moneys paid out for expenses incurred in condemnation proceedings, upon the filing with the City Comptroller of property attested court orders setting forth the amount of said expenses" approved September 27, 1907, and Ordinance No. 17064 entitled: "An ordinance directing the payment of the compensation of the Board of Eminent Domain Commission from the general fund upon the filing of properly attested court orders therefor and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor" approved September 27, 1907.
